channel.title: bleu on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.
channel.description: Recent content in bleu on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.

item.title: Manga
item.description: Manga had some of the nicest yellows from all of Bleu and Patch’s sons. He has a striking facial pattern and is a classic Ambilobe panther chameleon. We’re very lucky to have him in our 4th generation breeding program. Manga Manga1

item.title: Bleu x Patch
item.description: This pairing was between our third generation hold back, Patch, and our male from Jeremy Booker, Bleu, from Brightside Chameleons. Bleu is the only male with Stryfe in him and we are excited to see what that brings to the project. Bleu x Patch Hatch dates 9/12/2020 - 9/27/2020 Hatch rate 29/32 F1

item.title: Bleu
item.description: Bleu is a male we picked up from the Stryfe line. He was raised by Jeremy Booker at Brightside Chameleons, and he was a bit of a challenge to work with. We released him in early 2020 and only produced a few clutches with him. We hope to select some nice males from his offspring to bring that line into our project.

item.title: Lineage: Brightside Chameleons
item.description: Brightside Chameleons Stryfe Stryfe Stryfe1 Stryfe2 Sire Dio Dam Stryfe’s Dam Emma Frost Sire Felipe Sanchez Dam Sire Macho Perregrin/Pyro Pyro
